sections.title: Section A – Strategic Understanding
questions: The organisation has a documented strategic corporate plan that aligns with relevant national health and development plans.

I have an individual work plan aligned with the KRAs of my division or branch.

sections.title: Section B – Systems and Processes
questions: The organisation has effective legislation, policies, national health standards, and codes of conduct/ethics in place.
The organisation regularly reviews systems and processes to improve efficiency and effectiveness.
